document.full_text: onswipe, a new start-up based in new york, is hoping that publishers will want a way to make their web sites more touch-friendly to tablet and smartphone users.
document.title: onswipe introduces swipe-friendly tools for sites
lines_and_colors: onswipe, a new start-up based in new york, is hoping that publishers will want a way to make their web sites more touch-friendly to tablet and smartphone users.
